p: The virus that causes COVID-19 named SARS-COV-2 [ 3], SARS-CoV-2 and SARS-CoV have highly similar gene sequences and behavior patterns. This paper summarizes the differences in the epidemiology, clinical manifestations, and treatment of SARS and COVID-19 during the two outbreaks, summarizes the lessons learned, and provides a comprehensive reference for the global epidemic prevention and treatment of COVID-19.
